name: New Planets
description:
In 2050, the American scientist called Franklin, who owns a space research company, called “A.R. Lab - Advanced Research Lab”, discovers a new solar system, located 10,000 light years from Earth. Franklin goes to check the teleportation portal, when suddenly, on the machine's screen, an unknown creature appears. Seth his student, tries to warn him, but to no avail. Your teacher ends up being teleported to a new solar system.
Now Seth must run to save his teacher!

Features


- 4 worlds.
- 8 long levels.
- 5 bosses.
- Soundtrack inspired by 16-bit games.
